title: Nutrition
text: Whole, natural foods that nourish and restore the body.

title: Physical Activity
text: Regular movement designed for longevity, not exhaustion.

title: Rest & Sleep
text: Healing occurs when the body and mind are allowed to rest.

title: Sunlight & Nature
text: Natural light and fresh air support physical and mental health.

title: Mental & Spiritual Health
text: Peace of mind and purpose are essential to true wellness.
